ActionTree - Class in model.player.action
Contains all the possible actions the player is allowed to perform Each tree has a specific ID based upon the possible moves: 1: standard tree 2: tree with one powered action 3: tree with two powered actions 4: frenzy tree for players whose turn comes after the first player's one 5: frenzy tree for players whose turn comes before the first player's one
ActionTree(int) - Constructor for class model.player.action.ActionTree
Action Tree's constructor
